comments:
This is the results of the 2.0M6 testing with JEE5-UC2 
http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/WTP_JEE5_Test_Scenarios

I can follow the steps until the point when I try to generate entities from the project explorer context menu Java Persistence > Generate Entities.

There are two different types of behavior:

1) If the the connection to Derby is open, the wizard never opens.
2) If the connection to Derby is closed, the wizrd opens but cannot connect to DB.  error log lists some exceptions.

Finally - If I try a workaround and code the classes (Inventory/Order/..) manually, the JPA properties windows cannot connect to DB (i.e. cannot choose a table column, etc).

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.wizards.GenerateEntitiesWizard.getPossibleTables(GenerateEntitiesWizard.java:106)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.wizards.GenerateEntitiesWizardPage.createControl(GenerateEntitiesWizardPage.java:119)
at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.Wizard.createPageControls(Wizard.java:170)
at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.createPageControls(WizardDialog.java:624)
at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.createContents(WizardDialog.java:509)
at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.create(Window.java:426)
at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.create(Dialog.java:1081)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.actions.GenerateEntitiesAction.execute(GenerateEntitiesAction.java:59)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.actions.ProjectAction.execute(ProjectAction.java:90)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.actions.ProjectAction.execute(ProjectAction.java:71)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.actions.ProjectAction.run(ProjectAction.java:63)
This is associated with bug 181852.  When that bug has been fixed, this bug should no longer occur.

Update from bug 181852 - The workaround is to change your DTP Connection "Database" field to "", or in other words, leave it empty.  This will look odd in your Data Source Explorer, but you will get DB related content/validation, etc in Dali.
This issue should be resolved by the fixes introduced for [152259] NPE in GenerateEntitiesWizard, and [181852] Unable to obtain schema information from certain databases
